00173 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_SimpleAliasTable {
00174 
00175 public:
00176 
00182     EGS_SimpleAliasTable(int N, const EGS_Float *f);
00183 
00185     ~EGS_SimpleAliasTable();
00186 
00191     int sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) const {
00192         int bin = (int) (rndm->getUniform()*n);
00193         return rndm->getUniform() < wi[bin] ? bin : bins[bin];
00194     };
00195 
00196 private:
00197 
00198     int       n;          
00199     EGS_Float *wi;        
00200     int       *bins;      
00201 
00202 };
